Lyric:
[by:Mobinyo]
[00:02.21]Saturday morning jumped out of bed
[00:06.72]and put on my best suit
[00:09.57]Got in my car and raced like a jet,
[00:14.29]all the way to you
[00:17.08]Knocked on your door with heart in my hand
[00:21.60]To ask you a question
[00:24.38]'Cause I know that you're an old fashioned man
[00:29.17]yeah yeah
[00:30.91]Can I have your daughter for the rest of my life?
[00:34.17](Say yes, say yes)
[00:35.86]'Cause I need to know
[00:37.67]You say I'll never get your blessing till the day I die
[00:41.54]Tough luck my friend but the answer is no!
[00:46.55]Why you gotta be so rude?
[00:50.20]Don't you know I'm human too
[00:53.89]Why you gotta be so rude
[00:57.95]I'm gonna marry her anyway
[01:00.46](Marry that girl) Marry her anyway
[01:04.10](Marry that girl) Yeah no matter what you say
[01:07.83](Marry that girl) And we'll be a family
[01:12.42]Why you gotta be so rude
[01:27.66]Why you gotta be so rude
[01:42.19]Why you gotta be so rude
[02:00.53]Why you gotta be so rude
[02:04.33]Don't you know I'm human too
[02:07.76]Why you gotta be so rude
[02:12.07]I'm gonna marry her anyway
[02:15.55]I hate to do this, you leave no choice
[02:19.31]Can't live without her
[02:22.48]Love me or hate me we will be boys
[02:26.71]Standing at that alter
[02:30.35]Or we will run away
[02:33.88]To another galaxy you know
[02:37.35]You know she's in love with me
[02:41.16]She will go anywhere I go
[02:43.89]Can I have your daughter for the rest of my life?
[02:46.94](Say yes, say yes)
[02:48.97]'Cause I need to know
[02:50.60]You say I'll never get your blessing till the day I die
[02:54.45]Tough luck my friend cause the answer's still no!
[02:59.48]Why you gotta be so rude?
[03:03.19]Don't you know I'm human too
[03:06.93]Why you gotta be so rude
[03:10.91]I'm gonna marry her anyway
[03:13.38](Marry that girl) Marry her anyway
[03:17.01](Marry that girl) Yeah no matter what you say
[03:20.67](Marry that girl) And we'll be a family
[03:25.35]Why you gotta be so rude?
[03:40.60]Why you gotta be so rude?
[03:55.28]Why you gotta be so rude?
[04:13.37]Why you gotta be so rude?
[04:17.02]Don't you know I'm human too
[04:20.69]Why you gotta be so rude?
[04:24.98]I'm gonna marry her anyway
